text: Carl Brewer (March 8, 1957 â€“ June 12, 2020) was an American Democratic politician. He was the 100th mayor of Wichita, Kansas and was Wichita's first black mayor. He was elected in 2007 and reelected in 2011. He was born in Wichita. Brewer died on June 12, 2020 in Wichita at the age of 63. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American mayors Category:Politicians from Wichita, Kansas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Carl Brewer (politician)
